dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S1026 IS: North American Alternative Fuels Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Barrasso (for himself, Mr. Manchin, Mr. Hoeven, Ms. Heitkamp, and Mr. Enzi) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007 to repeal a provision prohibiting Federal agencies from procuring alternative fuels.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the North American Alternative Fuels Act.

section.header: Repeal of prohibition of the procurement and acquisition of alternative fuels

subsection.text: Section 526 of the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007 (Public Law 110â€“140; 42 U.S.C. 17142) is repealed.
Section 30310 of title 51, United States Code, is repealed.
